title: When will the Senate vote on the spending bill? Where things stand
shortDescription: It's up to the Senate to pass the spending bill and get it to President Donald Trump’s desk to avert a possible government shutdown.

title: Trump,Tesla influencer: Violence against Tesla is domestic terrorism
shortDescription: The federal cost cutting measures undertaken by Musk have spurred "Tesla Takedown" protests with dealerships being vandalized across the nation.

title: New Hampshire Sen. Jeanne Shaheen will not seek reelection
shortDescription: The New Hampshire Democrat's retirement announcement puts another competitive race in play for the 2026 mid-term campaign.

title: Trump's mass layoffs take aim at NOAA as workforce cut by 20%
shortDescription: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is laying off more than 1,000 workers as part of President Trump’s federal government overhaul.

title: Canada, EU quickly strike back at Trump tariffs; recession fears mount
shortDescription: Canada and the European Union quickly unveil retialatory levies against the U.S., hours after Trump's sweeping tariffs on steel and aluminum.

title: Trump metals tariffs kick in, sparking quick retaliation by EU
shortDescription: Donald Trump’s tariffs on imports of metals took effect. They impose 25% duties on shipments of steel and aluminum - with no countries excepted.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump steels against trade foes
shortDescription: Increased tariffs on steel and aluminum imports take effect. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: Greenland's opposition Demokraatit party wins election
shortDescription: Greenland's opposition Demokraatit party won Tuesday's election that was dominated by President Donald Trump's pledge to take control of the island.

title: Why Trump tariffs are good politics in Canada and Mexico
shortDescription: President Trump's tariffs have caused an upswell in support for leaders in Canada and Mexico.

title: Trade war escalates as Trump's tariffs on steel, aluminum take effect
shortDescription: Trump's action to bulk up protections for American steel and aluminum producers restores effective global tariffs of 25% on all imports of the metals.

title: Millions frozen for UMaine in wake of Trump-governor clash
shortDescription: The U.S. Department of Agriculture froze millions in funding for the University of Maine this week as the feds review its athletic policies.

title: Here's how every representative voted on the GOP's funding bill
shortDescription: A GOP plan to avert a government shutdown barely passed the Republican-controlled House. Here's how each member voted.

title: President Trump buys a Tesla
shortDescription: President Donald Trump bought a Tesla in show of support of Elon Musk and said it'll be used at the White House.

title: Ivy League school: Trump funding cuts will impact 'critical' functions
shortDescription: University officials say they're committed to addressing the president's concerns that Jewish students felt unsafe on campus during protests.

title: Next wave of federal layoffs is here. What to expect from Trump's plan
shortDescription: Federal agencies have until Thursday, March 13 to submit plans to the Trump administration for large-scale layoffs, called a reduction in force.

title: House passes GOP funding plan as showdown looms in Senate over bill
shortDescription: The House passed a government funding bill, daring Senate Democrats to oppose it and risk a partial shutdown as stocks wobble.

title: Trump cuts Education Department in half following mass layoffs
shortDescription: Roughly 1,300 Education Department staffers received layoff notices Tuesday, a Trump administration official said.
